interpretation: The Bear card represents strength and protection. Like the bear, you have the ability to fiercely protect yourself and those you care about. Trust your instincts and listen to your inner voice. The bear also reminds you to take time for rest and rejuvenation. It is important to balance your strength with moments of relaxation and self-care. This card can also indicate a need for independence and self-sufficiency. Trust in your own abilities and don't be afraid to take on challenges alone. Overall, the Bear card is a reminder to tap into your inner strength and use it to protect yourself and those you love.
